sentences.en: A judge accepted her plea that she was guilty of manslaughter, not murder.
sentences.cn: 她申诉说自己并非蓄意谋杀，而是过失杀人，法官接受了她的申诉。

sentences.en: A plea bargain was offered by the state assuring her that she would not go to prison.
sentences.cn: 州方提出了一份认罪辩诉协议，保证她不会入狱。

sentences.en: Caldwell made a plea for donations.
He entered a plea of " not guilty " to the charges filed against him.
sentences.cn: 他针对对他的指控提出 “ 无罪 ” 的抗辩.

sentences.en: He fences his doctrines with the specious plea that statesmen mustlive as the world lives.
sentences.cn: 他用似是而非的遁词为他的教义作辩护,说政治家必须象世人那样活着.

sentences.en: Her plea of guilty to manslaughter through provocation was rejected.
sentences.cn: 她因受到挑衅而过失杀人的有罪答辩被驳回。

sentences.en: Her plea was that she did not see the signal.
sentences.cn: 她的辩解是说她没看见信号.

sentences.en: In making that plea he will breathe in vain.
sentences.cn: 他做那种恳求是白费口舌的.

sentences.en: More and more criminals will agree to plea-bargain.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的罪犯会同意接受认罪辩诉协议。

sentences.en: No plea can be set up on the ground of ignorance.
sentences.cn: 以无知为理由而提出的抗辩是不能成立的.

sentences.en: Now the train stopped, and she was listening to his plea.
sentences.cn: 火车已经停了下来, 而她却还在听他哀求.

sentences.en: She made an impassioned plea for help.
The director of the charity made an impassioned plea for help.
sentences.cn: 慈善机构的负责人强烈请求帮助.

sentences.en: The manager will make a special plea to draft the player into his squad as a replacement.
sentences.cn: 主教练将特别要求抽调这位运动员到他的队里做替补。

sentences.en: The naughty boy left the classroom on the plea of a headache.
sentences.cn: 那淘气的男孩借口头疼,离开了教室.

trans.tran_cn: 恳求，请求，（被告或被告律师的）抗辩，答辩，借口，托辞，请愿
trans.tran_en: a request that is urgent or full of emotion
